name: Box With A Gun
description:
STORY

The year is 1999.

You are a box with a gun.

CONTROLS

  • Move: Left thumb-stick or A (left) and D (right)
  • Shoot: Right thumb-stick or Left Mouse Button
  • Jump: Left bumper or Space Bar
  • Boost: Right bumper or Control (either one)
  • Reduce gun spread: Left trigger or Right Mouse Button

HOW TO PLAY

When you activate the waves, thousands of drones fly down towards you. Try to shoot them down before they tag you.

Hints:

  • Drones caught in your boost fire are destroyed.
  • With left trigger, reduce your bullet spread for more accurate fire.
  • Box with a gun!!!
